Text.Page:
Aviator cap? Those are so last year.

It's the cyasma-infused leather, you see. Rough hide and grave hide are plentiful, but nobody makes the cyasma-infused leather. So don't even ask."But I already have some..."
You actually had some cyasma-infused leather? Well, I suppose I can make one more aviator cap, if you're sure you want one.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I am!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Even the Invalesco don't trade in cyasma-infused leather anymoreâ€”and if they don't have it, no one would.
